text: Atahpara e ghatanara pare tomadera antara kathina haye geche. Ta patharera mata athaba tadapeksa'o kathina. Patharera madhye emana o ache; ya theke jharana prabahita haya, emana'o ache, ya bidirna haya, atahpara ta theke pani nirgata haya ebam emana'o ache, ya allahara bhaye khaseparate thake! Allaha tomadera kajakarma samparke be-khabara nana.
